Banner.text_new: Secure, easy one-click meetings, with Voice, Video, Chat, Rooms, Discussions and screen sharing. Hosted in Bangladeshi-based Datacenters, on Amazon Cloud or on your own privated hosted Datacenter.
Banner.text2: Voice, Video, Chat and Screen-sharing from your PC Browser or from your Smart Phone in easy one-click meetings.
Banner.text3: Scale from small 1-on-1 meetings to very large meetings powered by our Push-to-Talk technology. Meetings are hosted in our Bangladesh based Datacenters.
Banner.server_security: Private Hosting on your own Servers available for security-conscious Business Customers
Banner.subscription: Subscriptions available for large meetings and confirmed server connections
Banner.card_text: Easily setup and share your online HD meeting experience with just a few clicks
Banner.jog_school_des: Live, interactive lectures hosted on Jogajog Meeting Platform. Full classroom experience with online exams, assessments and grading. Breakout sessions, shared whiteboards and streamed audio/video.
Banner.jogajog_text: Collaborate, Monitor and Interact with your team
Banner.jogajog_teams_des: Always-On-Mission-Critical and Enterprise Communications Empowering Field And Teams Operations Team discussion channels in parmanent Rooms.
